segments.text: Why are you reading the classifieds ? What do you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m looking for a bookcase , but I don ’ t want to buy a new one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . There aren ’ t any used bookcases listed . But there are a few rummage sales on Saturday . I think I ’ ll go to them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I go with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . These private sales are great places to bargain . And sometimes you can find terrific things among all the junk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I learned to negotiate 9 from my mother . I thought I was pretty good at bargaining , but I had a problem the other day at Kimble ’ s Department Store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to buy a beautiful wool sweater for my girlfriend . It was priced at forty dollars , so I started by offering the salesclerk thirty .
segments.speaker: S1
